content.heading: diceware
content.subhead: Generate secure passphrases with the Diceware method

children.text: diceware: Generate secure passphrases with the Diceware method

content.html:
This is the code for https://diceware.herokuapp.com. Feel free to host your own version and make any modifications.

Running the application

$ bundle exec rackup -s puma -p 9292 config.ru

The app can now be accessed on http://localhost:9292/
